summary: 1996 DODGE NEON WITH A LITTLE OVER 70,000 MILES ON IT.  CAR IS LEAKING OIL..ACCORDING TO MECHANIC, THE HEAD GASKET NEEDS TO BE REPLACED AT A COST OF $700-$800.  MECHANIC INDICATED THAT THIS IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM WITH THE NEON.  I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THERE IS A RECALL ON THIS ISSUE.  IF NOT, IS THERE ANY STEPS I CAN TAKE TO HAVE THIS COST PAID BY DODGE? TS
